snippet.title: Dandara Switch Announce Trailer
snippet.description:
We’re pleased to introduce you to Dandara—a Metroidvania-inspired adventure featuring a bold heroine trying to bring direction to a directionless world in a bizarre, gravity bending place teeming with beauty. We tip our hats to the developers Long Hat House for creating such a wondrous, curious universe, one we fell in love with the moment we were allowed to enter its portals.

Dandara is being developed for PC, consoles, and mobile, and specifically with the Nintendo Switch in mind.
